price: 74.Tokkel Nabii Ibraahimik qibni maaqót abe cinimih kaa geyte meesi kaak gexxeeh Iscaaqh kee Yaq-qhuub aytikuma kaah temeete waqdi, usuk Ni Malaykay Nabii Luut marih baysiyyah rubne giddiya.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahaba ʿan ib'rāhīma al-rawʿu wajāathu al-bush'rā yujādilunā fī qawmi lūṭin
